com.viaoa.jfc.table

Interface OATableComponent

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    OATableFilterComponent
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    OAButton, OACheckBox, OAColorComboBox, OAComboBox, OACommand, OACustomComboBox, OADateComboBox, OAFormattedTextField, OALabel, OALabelWithButton, OAList, OAPasswordField, OAPopupList, OARadioButton, OATableComboBox, OATextArea, OATextField, OATextFieldAutoCompleteList, OATextFieldFilter, OATextFieldLookup, OATreeComboBox, OATreeTableController

    public interface OATableComponent
    Interface that defines the behavior for OATableComponents to work with an OATable. Any component that implements this interface can be used as a Table Column.

    For more information about this package, see documentation.
